content.en: MRI-based tumor analysis: Scientists are using machine learning algorithms to analyze MRI images and predict important characteristics of brain tumors. These algorithms can classify the molecular characteristics of glioblastoma, predict patient survival and molecular subtype, and even distinguish between different types of brain tumors. By analyzing radiomics features derived from MRI scans, these algorithms are able to make accurate predictions and improve the stratification of patients with glioblastoma.
content.da: MR-baseret tumoranalyse: Forskere bruger maskinlæringsalgoritmer til at analysere MRI-billeder og forudsige vigtige karakteristika ved hjernetumorer. Disse algoritmer kan klassificere de molekylære karakteristika af glioblastomer, forudsige patientoverlevelse og molekylære subtyper, og endda skelne mellem forskellige typer af hjernetumorer. Ved at analysere radiomiksegenskaber afledt fra MRI-scanninger, er disse algoritmer i stand til at lave præcise forudsigelser og forbedre stratificeringen af patienter med glioblastom.
